title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. This behavior is unexpected and needs to be addressed.
OB: Open the SWT example ControlExample in Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K. Navigate to the Text tab and select Styles > SWT.SINGLE. Then, switch back to Styles > SWT.MULTI.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not emit a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. The behavior should be consistent across all text styles.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue causing the ControlExampleText to beep when selecting SWT.MULTI in the SWT example.
